text: West Bank | IOF-backed settlers wreak havoc and violently raid villages of Al-Sawiya, Qusr and Duma, Nablus and Al-Mughayir, Ein Siniya, and Al-Mazra'a Al-Gharbiya, Ramallah.
Happening Now| Intense Israeli bombardment in Al-Nuseirat, Central Gaza
Loved ones bid farewell to those killed by Israeli airstrikes in Beit-Hanoun, Northern Gaza last night
Everyday, more than 10 children lose at least 1 limb in Gaza.
Moments Ago: Multiple injured in an Israeli airstrike on a family home in Deir Al-Balah, Central Gaza

Earlier Today in Germany:   • Police arrested activists at a pro-Palestine conference in Berlin  • Germany deported Dr. Ghassan Abu-Sittah, a surgeon who served on a voluntary mission to Gaza, in an attempt to prevent him from attending & sharing his experience
A family home was targeted in Deir Al-Balah
Gaza in the last 24 hours:  lsrael bombed 8 families,  Killing at least 89 people   and injuring 120.  Note that this number does not include the people who are still under the rubble.

BREAKING: Violent settler groups protected by the IOF set homes and vehicles on fire during an attack on the village of Al Mughayir, northeast of Ramallah.   One person has been killed so far and several people injured.
Earlier Today: Journalist Sami Shehada had his leg amputated after he and his colleagues were attacked by the IOF on the outskirts of Al-Nuseirat refugee camp, Central Gaza
